mapper.select: select * from mst_user_info_tb where user_email=#{user_email} and user_type='nomal'
mapper.insert: insert into MST_USER_INFO_TB(user_email, user_pw, user_nm, user_addr, user_phone_no) values(#{user_email},#{user_pw},#{user_nm},#{user_addr},#{user_phone_no})
mapper.select: select * from MST_USER_INFO_TB where user_email = #{user_email} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
mapper.update: update MST_USER_INFO_TB set user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_nm = #{user_nm}, user_addr = #{user_addr}, user_pro_img = #{user_pro_img}, user_phone_no = #{user_phone_no} where user_email = #{user_email}
